text: == Events == === By place === ==== Europe ==== * Battle of Maldon: The Anglo- Saxons are beaten by Viking invaders led by Olaf Tryggvason, later Olaf I of Norway. * Sweyn I of Denmark gets his throne back. == Births == * Sigurd Hlodvirsson, Earl of Orkney * Abdullah Yousef, of Kuwait == Deaths == * Theophanu, empress, mother of Otto III (b. 956) * Emperor En'yÅ«, emperor of Japan (b. 959) == References ==
